title: ATen mirror needs to start pulling in directories that are not directly in its subdirectory
body_html:
As we start bringing together common pieces between PyTorch and Caffe2, it will no longer be the case that the most logical place for a third party library or a cmake to live is in the aten/ folder. This has implications for ATen mirroring, because it means that if you have only the ATen subdirectory, that is not sufficient to build. In this case, we need to copy depended upon files (e.g., cmake/Modules_CUDA_fix) into the root dir when we do the mirror, and test for the file in both locations.

CC @zdevito @prigoyal
